sentences.en: He was tall for an eight-year-old.
sentences.cn: 对一个8岁的孩子来说他长得很高。

sentences.en: The eight-year bond will bear annual interest of 10.5%.
sentences.cn: 这份8年期的债券将产生10.5%的年息。

sentences.en: The prospects for peace in the country's eight-year civil war are becoming brighter.
sentences.cn: 在该国的8年内战中，和平的前景正变得越来越光明。
